name: check-ml
title: Mobile Legends (ML)
description: Memeriksa dan mengambil nama/nickname pemain Mobile Legends. User ID dan Zone ID harus digabungkan langsung tanpa spasi atau karakter lainnya.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.label: User ID + Zone ID Mobile Legends

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-ml \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"123456789123"}'
